summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4292 for the improvement of Meridian Avenue, from North 80th Street to North 85th Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50955, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
